Posts.Content: GTYforeveryoung wrote: I just joined this site.  It is nice to have a place to read about others who have gone through this!  I received my first round of TC 2 weeks ago.  It seems that the average time for the start of hair to fall out is about 2 weeks.  So..............I sit here and wait.........and wait.  I don't want it to fall out so I have been anxious.  I wish it would just happen and get it over with! When it starts I am going to have a shaving party with my girlfriends.  Someone said that since I am just on 4 doses of TC every 3 weeks it may not fall out.  That would be great but I am mentally preparing for the worst and if it doesn't I will pleasantly surprised.  I usually get it highlighted and am due for a touch up but I don't want to spend the $$$$ if it is going to fall out soon!  Know what I mean?  Anyway, has anyone NOT had their hair fall out?  I am not good at all this waiting!  Thanks in advance for sharing. GTY: lumpectomy 3/10/09, receiving 4 rounds of TC followed by 6 weeks daily rad Dx 3/2/2009, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 3, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Waiting for hair to fall out......Yikes! GTYforeveryoung domenique
